metadata.inclusion:
1. Go to the 'Network functionality' tab and press either the 'Classic' or 'NWI' button under the 'Learn Mode' header.
2. Press the 'Start' button to start the learn mode.
3. Enter the first 5 digits of the DSK on the including node.
4. Press the 'Close' button to close the dialog when completed.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Go to the 'Network functionality' tab and press the 'Exclude' button.
2. Press the 'Start' button to start the exclusion process.
3. Press the 'Close' button to close the dialog when completed.
metadata.reset:
1. Go to the 'Network functionality' tab and press the 'Factory Reset' button.
2. Press the 'Reset' button in the dialog to reset all Z-Wave functionality to factory defaults.
